title: LoCo: Low-Contrast-Enhanced Contrastive Learning for Semi-Supervised Endoscopic Image Segmentation
details: L Cai, Y Li, X Fan, K Song, Y Li, Y Yuan, R Wang, W Lei - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: The segmentation of endoscopic images plays a vital role in computer-aided diagnosis and treatment. The advancements in deep learning have led to the employment of numerous models for endoscopic tumor segmentation, achieving …
